channel.title: Need Help A.S.A.P@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
channel.description:
Hi I'm Having Problems With My Java. When I Run It It Says " ' JAVA ' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch files. "
My PATH Is Set To : C:\j2sdk1.5.0_04\bin;C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT;C:\WINNT\system32\Wbem
My Classpath Is Set To : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
** There Both Under System Varibles. **
My Programs Of Java Say.... Java(TM) 6 Update 14, And Java(TM) SE Development Kit 6 Update 13
If You Answer And It Works I Will Rep You And Please Make It Simple Example " Change Your Class Path To "A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O P" And Your PATH To " Moparscape "

item.title: Need Help A.S.A.P@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

[quote=“death race, post:1, topic:274369”] My PATH Is Set To : C:\j2sdk1.5.0_04\bin;C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT;C:\WINNT\system32\Wbem

My Classpath Is Set To : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/quote]

Your looking at the wrong paths,
Their supposed to be at the top
where it says “User Variables for the internet”

And their not supposed to look like that because that is through your computers system variables…

They are supposed to look something like this;
eg;

Variable Name: Classpath
Variable value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin

There you go, kind of gave it away…

Then when you have done that edit your run.bat or whatever it is called on your server and change it to that path if it is not already done.

Read full topic

item.description:
@death_race wrote:

Hi I’m Having Problems With My Java. When I Run It It Says " ’ JAVA ’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch files. "

My PATH Is Set To : C:\j2sdk1.5.0_04\bin;C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT;C:\WINNT\system32\Wbem

My Classpath Is Set To : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

** There Both Under System Varibles. **

My Programs Of Java Say… Java™ 6 Update 14, And Java™ SE Development Kit 6 Update 13

If You Answer And It Works I Will Rep You And Please Make It Simple Example " Change Your Class Path To “A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O P” And Your PATH To " Moparscape "
